channel.title: [614] savedgames .ser files arn't the usual .dat [614]
channel.description:
Just a question for anyone in development of 614 servers on how to change the player rights on these servers since the files arn't .dat extension, they are .ser extension and they come up half unreadable on notepad/++.
Is there anyway to decompile .ser files so I can read them and modify them because all I'm really trying to do is edit the player rights.
Thanks~
